entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
